Package ru.nikitat0.graph

Interface Graph

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AdjacencyBasedGraph, AdjacencyList, AdjacencyMatrix, EdgeList
    public interface Graph
    A graph data structure with basic operations for managing vertices and edges.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods

      Applies the given action to each vertex adjacent to the specified vertex.
      void forEachVertex​(java.util.function.IntConsumer action)
      Applies the given action to each vertex until all vertices have been processed or the action throws an exception.

        Removes a vertex from the graph.
        Parameters:
        u - the identifier of the vertex
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the vertex does not exist

      • addEdge

        void addEdge​(int u,
             int v)
        Adds a new edge to the graph. Does nothing if the edge already exists.
        Parameters:
        u - the identifier of the first vertex
        v - the identifier of the second vertex
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if either u or v doesn't belongs to the graph

      • removeEdge

        void removeEdge​(int u,
                int v)
        Removes an edge from the graph. Does nothing if there is no such edge.
        Parameters:
        u - the identifier of the first vertex
        v - the identifier of the second vertex
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if either u or v doesn't belongs to the graph

      • getVertexNumberUpperBound

        Returns the current upper bound for vertex number.

        the current upper bound for vertex number

      • forEachVertex

        void forEachVertex​(java.util.function.IntConsumer action)
        Applies the given action to each vertex until all vertices have been processed or the action throws an exception.
        Parameters:
        action - the action to be performed for each element

      • forEachAdjacent

        void forEachAdjacent​(int u,
                     java.util.function.IntConsumer action)
        Applies the given action to each vertex adjacent to the specified vertex.
        Parameters:
        u - the vertex identifier
        action - the action to perform on each adjacent vertex

        Returns:
